連用形: Conjunctive form; continuative form; -masu stem of a Japanese verb
助動詞: Auxiliary verb (in Japanese); inflecting suffix or enclitic
五段・カ行イ音便: Godan (verb, verb conjugation)  -  the "ka" column of the Japanese syllabary table (ka, ki, ku, ke, ko)  -  euphonic change wherein some mora ('ki', 'gi', 'shi' and 'ri') are pronounced 'i'
基本形: Fundamental form; basic form; basic pattern; basic model; basic type; prototype
サ変接続: Irregular conjugation of s-stem verbs; conjugation of the verb "suru" - connection
サ変・スル: Irregular conjugation of s-stem verbs; conjugation of the verb "suru" - suru
形容詞・アウオ段: I-Adj - Row of syllables on the Japanese syllabary table that ends with the vowel sound "o"
形容詞・イ段: I-Adj - Row of syllables on the Japanese syllabary table that ends with the vowel sound "i"
形容動詞語幹: Adjectival noun (Japanese); quasi-adjective; nominal adjective; na-, taru-, nari- and tari-adjective
五段・カ行促音便: the "ka" column of the Japanese syllabary table (ka, ki, ku, ke, ko)  -  nasal sound change (generation of geminate consonant, primarily a geminate 't' from vowel stems ending in 'i')
未然形: nai stem (of a Japanese verb or adjective); irrealis form; imperfective form
並立助詞: parallel marker; particle used to list items (e.g. "to", "ya", "yara")
仮定形: Hypothetical form (of verbs and adjectives in modern Japanese)
